mapper.select:
select actv.id,sc.cmty_name,sl.coll_name,actv.actv_content,actv.actv_title,actv.deadline from actv left join sys_cmty sc on actv.cmty_id = sc.id left join sys_coll sl on sl.id = sc.coll_id
and sl.id = #{collId}
and actv.actv_title like concat('%',#{actv.actvTitle},'%')
and sc.cmty_name like concat('%',#{actv.cmtyName},'%')
and sl.coll_name like concat('%',#{actv.collName},'%')
